welcome to...

Long Lane Farm

Long Lane Farm is a collectively worked and organized farm dedicated to growing food and tending to the environment for and with the Middletown community. Through experiential learning, we strive to collapse the boundaries between theory and practice, work and play, productivity and creativity. At LLF, we gather to cultivate relationships between people and place within our community and celebrate the vital importance of small farms in a just and sustainable food system.

Get involved!

    Join the Listserv to get emails from the farm!
